Package ch.idsia.crema.inference

Interface InferenceJoined<M extends GraphicalModel<?>,​F extends GenericFactor>

  • Type Parameters:
    M - The model
    F - The actual Factor type
    All Superinterfaces:
    Inference<M,​F>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ConditionalVariableElimination, FactorVariableElimination, LikelihoodWeightingSampling, LogicSampling, StochasticSampling, VariableElimination
    public interface InferenceJoined<M extends GraphicalModel<?>,​F extends GenericFactor>
extends Inference<M,​F>
    Common interface of inference algorithm. Any model preprocessing requirements of the final inference algorithm must be performed byt the query method.

    This variant is used for inference engine that supports the inference of multiple query nodes at the same time. It is expected to return a joint probability in a single factor.

    Author:
    davidhuber
